actions.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, that if one Committee reports, the other Committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that any funds determined to be unnecessary for the defense of the United States should be applied directly to the economic defense of the American people by reducing the Federal deficit.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that any funds determined to be unnecessary for the defense of the United States should be applied directly to the economic defense of the American people by reducing the Federal budget deficit.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that any funds determined to be unnecessary for the defense of the United States should be applied directly to the economic defense of the American people by reducing the Federal deficit.
